get_bracket.default:
List of all brackets:
%1
Use `%0get_bracket $./parameter` to change the current bracket.

set_staff_channel.help: Sets the staff channel to ping staff role

set_ping_team.help: Sets if the team or the team captain should be pinged for reschedule.

set_post_result_message.usage_info: For more details, please check here: https://github.com/SpartanPlume/Tosurnament/wiki/set_post_result_message

set_post_result_message_team1_with_score.usage_info: For more details, please check here: https://github.com/SpartanPlume/Tosurnament/wiki/set_post_result_message

set_post_result_message_team2_with_score.usage_info: For more details, please check here: https://github.com/SpartanPlume/Tosurnament/wiki/set_post_result_message

set_post_result_message_mp_link.usage_info: For more details, please check here: https://github.com/SpartanPlume/Tosurnament/wiki/set_post_result_message

set_post_result_message_rolls.usage_info: For more details, please check here: https://github.com/SpartanPlume/Tosurnament/wiki/set_post_result_message

set_post_result_message_bans.usage_info: For more details, please check here: https://github.com/SpartanPlume/Tosurnament/wiki/set_post_result_message

set_post_result_message_tb_bans.usage_info: For more details, please check here: https://github.com/SpartanPlume/Tosurnament/wiki/set_post_result_message

set_registration_background_update.help: Sets whether the registration update background task should be run
set_registration_background_update.success: Registration update background task set to `%1`.

set_reschedule_deadline_hours_before_cur.help: Sets the deadline before current match time for reschedule (in hours before the match)
set_reschedule_deadline_hours_before_cur.success: Deadline hours before current time set to `%1`.

set_reschedule_deadline_hours_before_new.help: Sets the deadline before new match time for reschedule (in hours before the match)
set_reschedule_deadline_hours_before_new.success: Deadline hours before new time set to `%1`.

set_reschedule_deadline_end.help: Sets the final deadline to reschedule a match

set_notify_no_staff_reschedule.help: Sets the deadline to reschedule a match (in hours before the match)
set_notify_no_staff_reschedule.success: Notify no staff reschedule set to `%1`.

add_match_to_ignore.help: Adds matches in the list of matches to ignore in other commands
add_match_to_ignore.to_not_ignore: %1, the match **%2** is now not ignored anymore.

remove_match_to_ignore.help: Removes matches in the list of matches to ignore in other commands

set_registration_phase.help: Sets if the tournament is in the registration phase or not.

set_game_mode.help: Sets the game mode of the tournament, used when pulling information from api.
set_game_mode.default:
Possible game modes:
`0`: std
`1`: taiko
`2`: ctb
`3`: mania

sync_spreadsheet.help: Synchronizes the local copy of the spreadsheets of the tournament with the online spreadsheets

save_tournament_settings.help: Saves the tournament settings and gives a code corresponding to it
save_tournament_settings.success: Tournament settings saved. Code to use to load it: `%1`.
save_tournament_settings.os_error: The tournament template file could not be created or deleted.
